summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the CLIPSeg model’s initialization, configuration loading, forward passes, hidden state outputs, input embeddings, and training behaviors, including cross‑framework equivalence between PyTorch and Flax, gradient handling, and checkpointing options.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, compatibility, and performance of the CLIPSeg image‑segmentation model for reliable integration into production pipelines and research workflows.
